Good Morning UCA parents.

We will be dismissing early today due to the weather.
The Elementary School will dismiss at 11:45.
The Middle School will dismiss at 12:00.
The High School will dismiss at 12:15.
After school care, all athletic events & practices are cancelled.
Lunch will be served in the classroom today as well.
Thank you & safe travels!
-UCA Staff
